Emirates Hills Dubai is a prestigious gated community located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Emirates Hills is a world-class development in an unrivalled master plan community.
Dubai is home to many luxury property developments, but Emirates Hills is unquestionably the most exclusive. A place of paramount wealth and beauty, each of its villas are unique, reflecting the lives of the people that live there.
This golf-side real estate project has been developed in conjunction with Emaar Properties, a Dubai public joint stock company. Although the developer, Emaar Properties, pioneered the idea of freehold properties in Dubai, this is Emaar’s only project where land was sold per square foot to individuals to build the house of their choice. 
Please contact Alexander on +971508826124 to discuss further and arrange an internal viewing. 
The Emirates Hills Dubai development is occupied by the GCC super-rich and embassies, while other Emirates Living developments cater to the middle-class suburban community. It features a harmonious balance of well-appointed villas, handsome neighborhoods and lush landscaping.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionStep into this contemporary style villa and immediately you are struck by the ample light and spacious living areas. This property is the perfect family home and has been meticulously maintained by the owners, with a stunning pool and garden, as well as tasteful décor.The ground floor offers three living rooms that provide wonderful views of the pool and garden: a formal dining area adjacent to the kitchen, a central sitting room and a TV/family room.There is also an additional room, with en-suite, on the ground floor and an additional study, guest room or gymnasium.\xa0\xa0The sweeping circular staircase is a fitting feature in this property and leads to the first floor which has five large bedrooms - three of which have en-suite bathrooms and a further two rooms which share a bathroom with an additional family room.The Master Bedroom has a walk-in wardrobe area and en-suite with Jacuzzi bath and separate walk-in shower.\xa0 The second bedroom is also with en-suite and \x96 like the Master Bedroom \x96 has a balcony overlooking the garden, with clear views of the golf course. A further three bedrooms lead off of the first-floor family room, which is complete with beautiful decor.There is the option of installing a lift in this property, providing access to all three floors and also a pantry adjacent to the first-floor family room, which is currently used as a storeroom.The second floor has a further bedroom and bathroom, with access to the roof terrace where panoramic views of the Dubai skyline can be enjoyed.The stunning split-level swimming pool has been recently refurbished and there is also a spacious terrace area, covered patio, and wooden gazebo, offering a choice of where to relax in this beautiful garden.\xa0There is a faux grass play area, to the side of the property allowing children a shady spot to play.Permit No. 1612058926']

['DescriptionLA ROSA at Villanova, The newest residential investment in Dubai, its a gated-community with open spaces and lush landscapes. Wake up to a vibrant atmosphere, where the sound of birds chirping in the vast green expanse blends in with the soft murmur of kids playing in the neighborhood. Take a stroll on beautifully landscaped walking trails, inspired by Mediterranean architecture. The location of the Villanova LA ROSA project is accessible to mainly residential developments, such as The Villa, DLRC, Dubai Silicon Oasis, Falcon City, as well as activity centers such as Dubai Outlet Mall, Global Village and Academic City. You will love this stunning 4 bedroom + maids townhouse is in Fortuna Village, Victory Heights.
The property briefly comprises a spacious reception room, large modern fully equipped kitchen with appliances and 4 bedrooms.
There is one large bedroom on the ground floor with the remaining three bedrooms, including the master bedroom, on the first floor. The master bedroom comes with a modern en-suite bathroom, fitted wardrobes and dressing area. The second bedroom comes with fitted wardrobes and has direct access to the large terrace.
Finance is available for this property through haus & haus partners.
